messages.subject: Digest Number 859/Editing Posts
messages.msgSnippet: I have a favor to ask and thats if people would please edit their posts to the list.  Im on digest and for myself anyway it makes things very difficult to read
messages.messageBody:
I have a favor to ask and thats if people would please
edit their posts to the list. Im on digest and for
myself anyway it makes things very difficult to read
when I cant find the new posts among the old.

Rather than just hitting reply, please just use the
part of the message you wish to comment on and delete
the rest(as I did in my prior post). It would be very
helpful to someone like me with poor eyesight when my
eyes get tired and I dont want to miss anything on
this list. I have alot of learning to do.

Thank You! :)

Robin
